name: Inner Worlds
description:
Inner Worlds is an action adventure of the fantasy genre developed on GNU/Linux for Linux, DOS & Windows 95. It stars a female werewolf protagonist named Nikita. Nikita can change to wolf or human form. She's on a mission to destroy The Claws that has terrorized the world for generations.  The game consists of three episodes:
Wizard's World, is a search of Castle Drofanayrb for information on the whereabouts of The Claws. This episode was initially released as shareware.
World of Change, is a journey to the volcanic lair of the The Claws
Heart of the World, is the final confrontation.
The final two episodes were initially for buyers of the registered version but have since been released for "FREE". "if you can find the game for download from some other site [...] then "lucky you"! Grab it and enjoy! " - official site.
The Windows 95 version is MIA. The GNU/Linux version was hidden on the CD-ROM of the DOS version and has not yet been seen in the interwebs.

Original requirements:
CPU: 486 or better
Display: VGA
RAM :8 Mb
Sound Card: Sound Blaster compatible or Gravis Ultrasound compatible
